family.about: I come from a supportive family that always encouraged education, discipline, and growth.
family.influence: My parents shaped my mindset to stay grounded, work hard, and think long-term.

personality.enthusiasm: I’m genuinely enthusiastic about tech, creativity, and building things that matter.

videoEditing.interest: I love video editing and enjoy shaping raw footage into meaningful stories.
videoEditing.why: It combines creativity with structure, just like software development.

phone.description: I like clean design, smooth performance, and well-built products.

car.whyILoveIt: It’s solid, well-engineered, and fun to drive.
car.drivingExperience: Tight steering, confident handling, sporty yet practical.
car.whatItSaysAboutMe: I value quality and engineering over just flashy design.
